attributes.action: (on behalf of Transport for London) put a more frequent bus service on the route of K3.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many times have passengers coming and going to work and school been left in the cold and rain for a K3 to arrive at the bus stop, to find a full bus. We the undersigned propose either the use of more frequent buses or the "bendy bus". We understand that using double decker buses are not an option due to the low bridges in the area.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with TfL and the Mayor of London.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
